de.systemagmbh.tools.math
Class CSysCompare

java.lang.Object
  de.systemagmbh.tools.math.CSysCompare
public final class CSysCompare
extends Object

The class CSysCompare was written to compare float numbers. Compensate round off errors.

Version:
$Revision: 1.3 $
Author:
Herbert Helmstreit

Method Detail

isNearUnity

public static boolean isNearUnity(double test)
Compare a double value against zero.

Parameters:
test - The value to test
Returns:
true, if the value can be treated as equal zero, false otherwise; Will return false if the argument was NaN

areEqual

public static boolean areEqual(double test1,
                               double test2)
Compare two double values.

Parameters:
test1 - The first value to test.
test2 - The second value to test.
Returns:
true, if the values can be treated as equal, false otherwise; If one ore both of the numbers are NaN the Result will be false.
